Description:
Detects Obfuscated Powershell via VAR++ LAUNCHER

Author: Timur Zinniatullin, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Invoke-Obfuscation VAR++ LAUNCHER OBFUSCATION - PowerShell Module
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where payload re '(?i)&&set.*(\{\d\}){2,}\\"\s+?-f.*&&.*cmd.*/c'
